xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.3 Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.3.2 Akusalapada » 2.3.2.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu-ārammaṇa
35.
1333Hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo hetusampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  dve.
1334Hetusampayutto akusalo dhammo hetusampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1335Hetuvippayutto akusalo dhammo hetuvippayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1336Hetusampayutto akusalo ca hetuvippayutto akusalo ca dhammā hetusampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
36.
1337Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca…pe…  avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
